title: 2016 ASCO Votrient Panel
description: A convention panel was constructed for the 2016 ASCO convention to gain insight on how doctors interact with their patients. This was achieved through a form which would display the cumulative results of the form through an animated graph on a separate screen.
imgAlt: Votrient Panel for the 2016 ASCO convention

title: Quality Measures Comparison Tool
description: The Quality Measures Comparison tool is a web and iPad application to provide a comparison of insurance companies based on the ranking of quality measures specific to diabetes.
imgAlt: Screenshot of the comparison tool on desktop and iPad.

title: Diabetes Sight Risk
description: Diabetes Sight Risk is a website detailing the effects of diabetes on your eyes and possible treatments.

title: MerckEngage Tracker
description: MerckEngage Tracker is a web application to assist people in tracking their weight, medicines, and blood sugar. My team at the time was responsible for providing this application to integrate into the MerckEngage site.
